name: park-land-discovery-platform
description: A comprehensive platform for discovering land properties near national and state parks

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
scripts.test: cd backend && npm test && cd ../frontend && npm test

author: Park Land Discovery Team
